titleStmt.title: The history of the Plot anatomised: or the late sham fanatical-plot, briefly and plainly laid open Wherein, those worthy patriots who were charged therewith, are vindicated from the malicious and false aspersions cast upon them by a late author. In a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Roger L'Estrange.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
